mapper.insert: insert into contract (employee_id, contract_type, start_date, end_date, status) values (#{employeeId}, #{contractType}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{status})
mapper.update: update contract set employee_id = #{employeeId}, contract_type = #{contractType}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, status = #{status} where id = #{id}
